title: Justin de Marseille
brief_description:
Justin is the boss of a drug trafficking gang who enjoys a great popularity for also offering protection to the poor. But Esposito, his old time rival, has sworn to eliminate him.

Credits: Director, Maurice Tourneur ; writer, Carlo Rim ; photography, Georges Benoit, Rene Colas ; music, Vincent Scotto, Jacques Ibert.
Cast: Berval, Ghislaine Bru, Pierre Larquey, Alexandre Rignault, Line Noro.
